name: models-dev
title: Models Dev
description: Explore AI model specifications, pricing, and capabilities from models.dev
author: carlesandres

preferences.name: enableBackgroundSync
preferences.title: Background Sync
preferences.description: Allow periodic background refresh of models data
preferences.label: Enable background sync

commands.name: search-models
commands.title: Search AI Models
commands.subtitle: Models Dev
commands.description: Search across all AI models by name, provider, or capability

commands.name: browse-providers
commands.title: Search AI Providers
commands.subtitle: Models Dev
commands.description: Explore AI providers and their model offerings

commands.name: background-sync
commands.title: Background Sync
commands.subtitle: Models Dev
commands.description: Refresh model data in the background

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
